description: Neapolitan Express is a set of organic eateries in New York serving organic and authentic Neapolitan Pizzas. We operate out of food trucks and in-store locations and we were the first company to launch a food truck fleet completely powered by compressed natural gas (CNG) and equipped to make authentic Neapolitan Pizza to standards set over one-hundred years ago in Italy. Our innovative technology and product is aimed at changing the mobile restaurant industry, resulting in greater energy efficiency and safety, food quality, service, design as well as a venue for community philanthropy.
name: Neapolitan Express
